Title: Implements statewide opioid settlement agreements and creates an opioid settlement fund
Summary: Implements statewide opioid settlement agreements; creates an opioid settlement fund; establishes an advisory board to address the opioid epidemic.
LawCode: Add Art 26 §§26.01 - 26.03, Ment Hyg L; add §97-bbbbb, St Fin L; amd §63, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, the state finance law and the executive law, in relation to implementing statewide opioid settlement agreements and creating an opioid settlement fund
